== Kunnamkulam (M) (803277) ==

Kunnamkulam (M) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 34.18 sq. km. and harbouring 13156 households with total population of 54071 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 327 km. Male population is 25392 and female population is 28679. Scheduled Caste population is 6419 and Scheduled Tribes population is 77. Census Location Code of the town is 803277<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 6 km.
